entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oxbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
